description:
GitLab doesn't host your git repos, it also allows for continuous
integration and deployment. This means that after pushing to the Git
repo, your code is tested them deployed automatically.

Using this with Docker allows for fast Python deployments to production.

In this talk I will be showing you how to setup a basic CI/CD with
GitLab. We will be making a basic Django project as an example.
title: Devops with Django Docker and Gitlab
